title: Font used on the poster of "Before The Devil Knows You're Dead"
content:
Hi,

I’m looking for a font which looks like the one used on the poster of “Before The Devil Knows You’re Dead”. It should contain the polygonal shape (no curves) and the unregular align of letters.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125131im_/http:/typophile.com/files/beforeDevil_6132.jpg)

Thanks a lot and sorry for my bad english.

 [‹ Font ID Please? Lend me your wisdom...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125131/http:/typophile.com/node/45398 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please Identify ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125131/http:/typophile.com/node/45377 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nbweb

comments.content: This lettering is custom made — notice the different shapes for duplicate letters. For more information on movie posters see my _[Screenfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125131/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=274)_ series on [Unzipped](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125131/http:/www.fontshop.be/).

Fink Sans by House industries isn’t the same but is in the same ballpark.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=20](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125131/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=20 "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=20")

JH

Bensfolk is also an affordable alternative:

[http://www.haroldsfonts.com/bensfolk.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906125131/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/bensfolk.html "http://www.haroldsfonts.com/bensfolk.html")
